results.title: The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit glass slides (Reptiles)
results.credit_line: ACMI Collection. Donated by William Kerr on behalf of Edwin Schefferle.
results.brief_description: There are three parts to the Reptiles slides, each slide has 4 images. These small slides have red sealing tape around the edges. These slides form part of The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit with removable chimney and internal wooden block. The lantern is housed in original box with metal handle, and internal red and blue graphic for: The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit. 20 glass slides in custom box, length of textile to keep box shut, 2 small empty boxes which act to store slides in a snug manner.
results.description: There are three parts to the Reptiles slides, each slide has 4 images. These small slides have red sealing tape around the edges. results.title: Jack the Giant Killer lantern slides
results.brief_description: Magic lantern slides made up of printed coloured images on round pices of glass mounted in a rectangular wood frame with a glue/resin. Frame has printed green label attached on one end noting ‘Patent Enamel Slides for the Magic Lantern, J Barnard & Son, Maker, London, Jack The Giant Killer. #’, the other end of slide has embossed text noting ‘B&S PATENT’.
results.description: Magic lantern slides made up of printed coloured images on round pices of glass mounted in a rectangular wood frame with a glue/resin.
